headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GLOVER, DAWSON C

snippet: GLOVER--Dawson C. III, "Berry," 62, died Friday, July 15, 2016, in Watch Hill, RI. He is survived by his beloved wife, Constance Bercovici Glover; his son, D. Coleman "Cole" Glover; his mother, Mrs. Donald Findlay; his three sisters, eight nieces,...
lead_paragraph: GLOVER--Dawson C. III, "Berry," 62, died Friday, July 15, 2016, in Watch Hill, RI. He is survived by his beloved wife, Constance Bercovici Glover; his son, D. Coleman "Cole" Glover; his mother, Mrs. Donald Findlay; his three sisters, eight nieces, three nephews, and 13 great-nieces and nephews. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to The Meredith Lewis Glover Pediatric Assistance Fund, Martin Health Foundation, P.O. Box 9010, Stuart, FL 34995. 1/3
